com.blukii.configurator.preferences

Class SwitchPreferenceEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • android.preference.TwoStatePreference
        • android.preference.SwitchPreference
          • com.blukii.configurator.preferences.SwitchPreferenceEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>

    public class SwitchPreferenceEx
extends android.preference.SwitchPreference
    Created by andre on 05.11.2015. WrapperClass for work around an android 4.x bug: SwitchPreference Controls switch their value during other actions out of control see https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=26194
